channel.title: how-to on Amit Gaur
channel.description: Recent content in how-to on Amit Gaur

item.title: How to use Digital Ocean Spaces for Arc Ecto file uploads
item.description: In this I explain how to use Digital Ocean spaces instead of Amazon S3 for uploading files using Arc Ecto

item.title: How to Refresh Tokens in Cognito using Amplify JS
item.description: In this I explain how to refresh idToken and accessToken in Cognito using Amplify JS

item.title: How to inject props into dynamically rendered components via slot in stenciljs
item.description: In this I explain how to pass props to components that are rendered dynamically in stencil js using Slot tag.

item.title: How to get remote ip from x-forwarded-for header in Phoenix
item.description: In this I explain how to get correct remote ip in phoenix framework from x-forwarded-for. When the server is being proxied through something like nginx.
